group_1.textCenter: Zzz...I can...still be...of service to...@Mmngh...my Queen...

group_1.textLeft: Oh dear—
I wonder if Kushu is dreaming about that world.

group_1.textRight: Maybe she got caught up in that story@Yachiyo 'n Mifuyu made.

group_1.textLeft: Could be. Even now she may still be@the Queen's servant in her dreams.
*Chuckle* What in the world could she be@dreaming about?

group_1.narration: This is the world of a story written@in the past of a country ruled by@the Fire Demon King and the Ice Queen,@a short time before the turmoil of that@took place on the holy night...

group_1.textLeft: Well, I suppose that's enough shopping for dinner,@don't you agree?

group_1.textRight: Yeah... *Yaaawn*...

group_1.textLeft: My, are you getting sleepy?
Then I'll carry you on my back until we get home.

group_1.textRight: Sure...

group_1.textLeft: *Chuckle* It's almost like you're a child.

group_1.narration: The Queen's back swaying@back and forth feels so nice...@Oh, but...that makes me sound like...

group_1.textLeft: What's wrong? You look so down.

group_1.textRight: ...Even though I'm her servant, she is the one@taking care of me...

group_1.textLeft: Well, our Queen is quite strong, wouldn't you say?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, she handles most things all on her own...
...Maybe she would be just fine without me.

group_1.textLeft: Oh dear...@I don't believe that's so...
But if it's bothering you...why not do your best@and show her what you're capable of?
Then our Queen might think you're amaaazing.

group_1.textRight: ...Yeah, I'll try that...

group_1.textLeft: Well, that should be enough shopping@for the Christmas festivities...

group_1.textRight: ...I shall carry the bags, my Queen.

group_1.textLeft: But these are heavy...@It would be too difficult for you...

group_1.textRight: Not at all, I am the Queen's servant, so...@I can handle this much.
Ah...
Um...I apologize, my Queen.@...I dropped them...

group_1.textLeft: It's alright, don't worry.@I can still carry them myself.

group_1.textRight: My Queen, regarding today's schedule...

group_1.textLeft: Yes, compiling the documents, and there's@the visitor from the neighboring country.

group_1.textRight: ...Yeah, that's...correct...
I shall prepare tonight's dinner...!

group_1.textLeft: Ah...I'm sorry, there's leftovers from yesterday@I made in advance, so you don't have to worry.

group_1.textRight: As...you say...@You are incredible, my Queen...

group_1.textLeft: ...What's wrong?@You seem a little somber...

group_1.textRight: I can't...be of any use to my Queen at all...is what...

group_1.textLeft: Eh— that is not true...!@Just being here helps me...

group_1.textRight: Just being here...?

group_1.textLeft: Right, going shopping together,@eating meals together...
You are always by my side, aren't you?
That fills me with such joy. That is what's most@important to me.

group_1.textRight: But that alone does not make me worthy@of being called your servant...

group_1.textLeft: Hmm...then, could you come over here?
Petting you like this feels almost like it's healing...
Ah— it's not just petting you—@it's much more than just that...!
This is a job only you can do...@or is that not enough?

group_1.textRight: Um...if that is all my Queen wants...@then that's fine...

group_1.textLeft: Great!@Okay, let's head home together.

group_1.textRight: Sure...

group_1.textCenter: (If my Queen keeps smiling, then that is fine@for now...I suppose.)

group_1.narration: Someday, I would love to show my Queen@just how cool I can be.

group_1.textRight: Good day...oh, that girl. She's napping@in the Coordinator's shop again?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, seems like she's dreaming,@apparently with "my Queen".

group_1.textRight: I see... I'm not sure what it's about, but I'm sure@it's a fun dream, don't you?
